facebook.description: The information is supplied to Facebook through setting Facebook pixels and converting APIs so that you can track customer behavior.

pixelId.title: Facebook pixel
pixelId.placeholder: Please enter the Facebook pixel number
pixelId.required: Please fill in the pixel number corresponding to the Convert API
pixelId.error: Facebook pixel number format error, the middle of the number must not have blank or special symbols before and after, and must be 15 yards or 16 yards.

conversionsAccessToken.title: Converting API accessor
conversionsAccessToken.tip: How to set a Facebook API accessor
conversionsAccessToken.error: The middle of the number is not blank before and after

dpa.title: Dynamic Advertising (DPA)

description.1: Please copy the dynamic URL, to the Facebook Advertising Management Background, the system will automatically submit and update the product directory to Facebook.

tip.0: Please confirm that you have established a product or enter the store name.
tip.1: If you still can't create a connection, please contact customer service.

dpa.set-pixel-id-first: Please set the pixel number first

google-analytics.title: Google Analytics Website Analysis
google-analytics.description: Don't forget to use Google Analytics to analyze service when operating a website. meepShop supports Google Analytics. All you have to do is follow a few simple steps to analyze and compare effectively, assisting the website to effectively invest places with the most traffic flow.

google-ads.tip: How to set Google ADS tracking adsure
google-ads.description: Ads conversion tracking can be used to track the action "after" a customer clicked the ads, including register, purchases. Action is considered conversion once a customer completed an action you defined valuable.
google-ads.warning: The system will perform data conversion when saving, and only retain the global code ID and event number after completion

dpa-description.0: Product Dialogue Update Time: 5:00 AM ~ 6:00 AM (GMT+08:00)
dpa-description.1: Please copy the URL of the dynamic file and paste it into your Google Merchant account to set up the feed. Google will retrieve it according to the set schedule.

google-webmaster.title: Google Search Console
google-webmaster.tip: How to set up Google Search Console
google-webmaster.description: Google Search Console assists you in determining the Google search traffic flow and efficiency of your website, rectifying problems and differentiate your website among thousands of Google search results.
google-webmaster.setting-placeholder: Please enter the verification code syntax

google-merchant-center.title: Google Merchant Center
google-merchant-center.description: Provide stores and product information to Google, let shoppers using a variety of Google services have the opportunity to come into contact with these information.
google-merchant-center.placeholder: Please enter the verification code syntax

google-tag-manager.title: Code Management Tools
google-tag-manager.tip: How to set up Google Tag Manager
google-tag-manager.description: Google Tag Manager is a tag management system that can help you rapidly update your tracking code and snippet through website user interface setting and tag deployment settings.
google-tag-manager.warning: The system will perform data conversion when saving, and only retain the global code ID and event number after completion

retention-milliseconds-track.title: Customize Stay Time Tracker
retention-milliseconds-track.tip: How to set the self-reserve advertising event provided by MeepShop
retention-milliseconds-track.description: This feature can track user staying behavior in all pages through third party tracking tools, Facebook Pixel and Google Analytics, and staying time can be customized.
